Confectionary Carnage Docs

This website documents the C# internals of Confectionary Carnage's game frontend. If you're unfamiliar with Unity, we've briefly summarized important concepts we've used here. Unity's full documentation is located here.

Important

DocFX Unity Integration has open bugs, but we've done the best we can.
